blog.name: notyour-true
blog.title: My hell. With love 😗
blog.description: There was an idea to bring together a group of remarkable peple to see if we could became something more. And We fucked up.

summary: Peter: *searching in Google* When Mr Stark asked me buy some products, but I've bought only chocolate, does it mean that I'm...
body:
Peter: *searching in Google* When Mr Stark asked me buy some products, but I’ve bought only chocolate, does it mean that I’m Venom?

Tony: *from the next room*

Mr Spider, I want to talk to you!

Stephen: If you say boyfriend material-

body:
Tony: Guess what my shirt is made of!
Stephen: If you say boyfriend material-
Tony: I wasn’t gonna!
Stephen: Good.
Tony: HUSBAND material!
Stephen: *sighs for a long time*

blog.name: lazydoodlesandfanfic
blog.title: ~Lazy Doodles and Fanfic~
blog.description: *REQUESTS ARE CLOSED * *NO SMUT* Welcome! I answer any and all questions, and here's the rules for requesting: https://lazydoodlesandfanfic.tumblr.com/post/169265737568/rules

title: Pressing Pause (Tony Stark X Reader) *PLATONIC
body:
Characters: Tony Stark X Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers

Warnings: Violence, guns, stealing

Request: Being a vigilante with the power to stop time and Tony Stark becomes a sort of Mentor to the reader. Later he realises they are homeless and have to earn their money by being a street musician. However they destroyed their guitar by smashing it over a villans head innorder to save Tony.

Your ability was something you had hated for a short time when you were younger. Sometimes you had moments of hatred for it, but then remembered your plan and pushed it back.

Your power was the ability to momentarily pause time. Not speed it up. Not to go back. Just to press pause at any given moment, and move around freely to do your own thing. You found out you could use your powers by pure will. If you wanted to pause time, it would happen, and you could keep it paused for as long as you wanted. However, you never liked to keep it paused for any more than 5 minutes, due to feeling lonely as the only thing moving. However, when the world became too loud, hitting pause for those few minutes was refreshing.

Throughout your time using your powers, you’d used them for both good and bad. You didn’t like doing bad with them, and preferred the latter, but whatever good deed you did got punished it seemed. First you used your powers to save a family member from being hit by a car, and that family member snitched on you to the rest of the family, who forced you to admit and to show your powers, before the promptly abandoned you. That left you, a kid, homeless, and setting a bad example of what to expect when people found out about your powers. For a good few years you only used your powers for your own needs. Like stealing food to survive without getting spotted, or even stealing money and sneaking into places. Pausing time just to sleep in a room you’d snuck into. It wasn’t until heroes started popping up with powers, giving people like you a better name that you decided to try and have a better look at your own actions.

You first started with things that just crossed your path. Muggings, thieves, and just assholes. They usually left the victims alone when you in turn stole their weapons and kicked their asses when they couldn’t fight back. It was about this time that the victims of these crimes started to not fear you, and soon when you helped the shops, they gave you stuff for free, and spread the word of a new hero in town.

While a lot of the heroes were difficult to come across in person, you were right there. People knew where to find you. They found you in the middle of the city, with that guitar and that case, strumming and singing during most of the day and into the afternoon, before looking for any trouble between working hours and later at night. Because of your new reputation, a lot of people offered more money. Their way of saying thank you for your little contribution of helping someone they knew, or themselves. It got to the point where the neighbourhood had been trying to get you more attention so you could have an official title.

This led to today’s shenanigans. Spotting Tony Stark walking ‘ in disguise’ down the road, on the phone. You were on the opposite side of the road, busy strumming a song, though you kept your eyes on him. Soon Tony put the phone down, and pulled off his glasses. “Excuse me?” He called, catching everyone’s attention, including you. “Everyone needs to evacuate this area, there’s a group coming this way that are bad news.” He announced, and it wasn’t long till people were taking off. However, you took your sweet time in packing up all the money given, not paying attention as Tony suited up. “Get a move on.” Tony called at you.

“Don’t worry about…” You turned, seeing someone sneaking up on Tony with a gun. As he raised his gun to fire, Tony turned and you froze time. You huffed, walking across the road, taking the gun off him, and throwing it down an alleyway. You decided that since you were here, you’d do a quick search for any other bad guys. Searching the alleys you found two others, and you even went to the top of one of the buildings to get a sniper. You threw his gun off the edge and carried him down. Because of the time being frozen or something of other, he felt weightless. It was probably something Tony himself could explain, but you weren’t bothered. You carried him down, rounded them up, before heading back to your spot, leaning against the wall and snapping your fingers.

You watched as the men were all groaning, some even throwing up due to the feeling of being moved from where they were not even a millisecond ago, and Tony retracted his helmet, looking confused on what had happened, looking over and seeing you watching. You have a small wave, before turning to walk off. “Wait!” He called, flying over your head and stopping in front of you. “How did you do that?” He asked. You shrugged, before you saw he was looking behind you, and he raised his hand. You stopped time, looking back, seeing one of the man had a gun pointed at you both, and instead of thinking logically, you raised your guitar and hit him with it, playing time again as he yelled in pain at the splinters and Tony took a shot to keep him down. “You just did it again. What is that?” Stark insisted.

“I have powers. I can stop time. It’s nothing special.” You shrugged, walking around him, this time not being followed. It wasn’t till a block later that you realised you’d smashed your guitar, and you cursed, now thinking on how you were going to make money now outside of dealing with petty crime.

A week later, you ended up back outside that building where it all happened. You had been planning to just walk down there for the cheap food and drink at the café down the road, until someone grabbed your shoulder. Time froze, you looked back, saw Tony, and started it again. “What?” You asked.

“What’s your name?” He asked.

“Have you been waiting for me to walk down this street all week?”

“What’s your name?” He asked again. You sighed.

“Y/N. My name is Y/N. Why do you want to know?” You answered, seeing a small smile on his face.

“Thought so… I want to hire you.” He said. You crossed your arms.

“What does that entail, and what do I gain from it?” You asked further.

“A decent paycheck, fame, and if your reputation grows good, then you’ll be called in to become an Avenger like me.” He explained. “Why, what else would you want? I’ll see what I can do.” He offered.

“I want a place to stay.” You answered, barely missing a beat, seeing his features shift.

“You’re homeless?” He asked, shifting foot to foot.

“Yep. Have been since I was a teenager. All because of my powers. I want somewhere to stay at least until I can pay the rent myself.” You explained. Soon that smile returned.

“Alright. I can arrange that. I’ll also let you pick out a new guitar since you smashed it to save me for the second time from being shot. Come on then.” He motioned his head for you to follow, even offering his hand for you. While you didn’t take it, you did follow after him. Finally, maybe something good was coming from stopping time.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in! 

*Not my gif

TAGS: @imbuckypositive @ari-maximoff @abbybills22 @waywardemo @httpmcrvel @mutantjediavenger @theoraekensnotsosecretlover @gayasfridge @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies @sebstanismylife

You watched as the men were all groaning, some even throwing up due to the feeling of being moved from where they were not even a millisecond ago, and Tony retracted his helmet, looking confused on what had happened, looking over and seeing you watching. You have a small wave, before turning to walk off. “Wait!” He called, flying over your head and stopping in front of you. “How did you do that?” He asked. You shrugged, before you saw he was looking behind you, and he raised his hand. You stopped time, looking back, seeing one of the man had a gun pointed at you both, and instead of thinking logically, you raised your guitar and hit him with it, playing time again as he yelled in pain at the splinters and Tony took a shot to keep him down. “You just did it again. What is that?” Stark insisted.

“I have powers. I can stop time. It’s nothing special.” You shrugged, walking around him, this time not being followed. It wasn’t till a block later that you realised you’d smashed your guitar, and you cursed, now thinking on how you were going to make money now outside of dealing with petty crime.

A week later, you ended up back outside that building where it all happened. You had been planning to just walk down there for the cheap food and drink at the café down the road, until someone grabbed your shoulder. Time froze, you looked back, saw Tony, and started it again. “What?” You asked.

“What’s your name?” He asked.

“Have you been waiting for me to walk down this street all week?”

“What’s your name?” He asked again. You sighed.

“Y/N. My name is Y/N. Why do you want to know?” You answered, seeing a small smile on his face.

“Thought so… I want to hire you.” He said. You crossed your arms.

“What does that entail, and what do I gain from it?” You asked further.

“A decent paycheck, fame, and if your reputation grows good, then you’ll be called in to become an Avenger like me.” He explained. “Why, what else would you want? I’ll see what I can do.” He offered.

“I want a place to stay.” You answered, barely missing a beat, seeing his features shift.

“You’re homeless?” He asked, shifting foot to foot.

“Yep. Have been since I was a teenager. All because of my powers. I want somewhere to stay at least until I can pay the rent myself.” You explained. Soon that smile returned.

“Alright. I can arrange that. I’ll also let you pick out a new guitar since you smashed it to save me for the second time from being shot. Come on then.” He motioned his head for you to follow, even offering his hand for you. While you didn’t take it, you did follow after him. Finally, maybe something good was coming from stopping time.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in! 

*Not my gif

TAGS: @imbuckypositive @ari-maximoff @abbybills22 @waywardemo @httpmcrvel @mutantjediavenger @theoraekensnotsosecretlover @gayasfridge @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies @sebstanismylife
trail.content_abstract:
Characters: Tony Stark X Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers

Warnings: Violence, guns, stealing

Request: Being a vigilante with the power to stop time and Tony Stark becomes a sort of Mentor to the reader. Later he realises they are homeless and have to earn their money by being a street musician. However they destroyed their guitar by smashing it over a villans head innorder to save Tony.

Your ability was something you had hated for a short time when you were younger. Sometimes you had moments of hatred for it, but then remembered your plan and pushed it back.

tags: no idea where this would go though
summary: So, @the-flightoficarus had a need for AUs of Bucky telling Tony about his parents before Steve did, and it had me writing a...
body:
So, @the-flightoficarus had a need for AUs of Bucky telling Tony about his parents before Steve did, and it had me writing a small thing.

—

I know Steve found out about this, and I assume he has already told you. But I couldn’t let it be without letting you know how sorry I am…

—

The letter fell from slack hands, drifting to the ground, the eyes that had been reading it now unseeing, staring at the distance.

The hands began to tremble, before suddenly clenching into hard fists. How… How dared he? How dared he keep this from him, this truth that he had all rights to know as soon as it came to light?

Tony scoffed, remembering Steve’s scathing words after the Ultron incident. Sometimes my teammates don’t tell me things. Pot, kettle, Tony thought, and wondered if it had even passed Steve’s mind at the time, the secret he himself had clutched so posessivly to his chest and refused to share.

Tony had been made to feel so ashamed for his actions and decisions back then, even when it didn’t seem useful at all at the time to have shared every stage of his and Bruce’s discoveries to a team that wouldn’t understand heads nor tails of their theories anyway. He had been yelled at, looked at with derision, choked out for his “secret keeping”.

And now here was the truth. All this time, Steve had kept something bigger from him while that hypocrite had dared to berate Tony from not laying out every detail of his research.

Well, Tony supposed, as he picked up the letter and read the last lines again, a secret for a secret is only fair.

I would do anything if it meant I could change what happened, what I’ve done to you. You know how to find me should you want to. I won’t stop you if you wanted to avenge them. Don’t tell Steve.

Tony smiles hollowly as he lets the letter be disintegrated by the repulsor in his palm. He can’t wait to meet the man Steve would throw him under the bus for in a heartbeat.

Neither can he wait to take him away from him.

summary: tony stark: No matter how many times you save the world, it always manages to get back in jeopardy again. Sometimes I just want...
body:
tony stark: No matter how many times you save the world, it always manages to get back in jeopardy again. Sometimes I just want it to stay saved! You know, for a little bit? I feel like the maid; I just cleaned up this mess! Can we keep it clean for... for ten minutes!

im not an avengers fan but i feel like this is something he would say idk tho

title: Our Child
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RObmXk

by Slayer_of_Destiny

After an attack on a Hydra compound, the Avengers find the Supersoldier program has been changed up. by mixing Bucky’s supersoldier DNA and Tony’s Extremis fuelled DNA to stabilise the subjects. Out of a lot of experiments, one child has survived. Now Tony and Bucky must pull together to be dads to this little boy. Slash.

title: To mourn and to dance
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2z0r6zd

by platypusperson

Several months after Steve Rogers, his husband, left him behind in a cave in Siberia, a quite pregnant Tony Stark wakes up to a very unexpected visitor bringing bad news. Can Tony, with a little outside help, come to terms with the past and move on from the present?

trail.content:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2z0r6zd

by platypusperson

Several months after Steve Rogers, his husband, left him behind in a cave in Siberia, a quite pregnant Tony Stark wakes up to a very unexpected visitor bringing bad news. Can Tony, with a little outside help, come to terms with the past and move on from the present?

Words: 1119, Chapters: ½, Language: English

blog.name: fandomgirl805
blog.title: Too many fandoms to choose from
blog.description: Avengers, Harry Potter, PJO, Teen Wolf, The Vampire Diaries, The Originals, Jane the Virgin, X Men, Avatar the Last Airbender

title: Chapter 1
body:
Based in Season 8 of Grey’s Anatomy and the First Avengers Film

Completely ignoring Mark and Lexie’s death, plane crash still happens but nobody dies. Suck it Shonda. 

Everything except my own story line and OCs belong to either Greys ABC, Shonda Rhimes, Marvel and Stan Lee.

May 2012

‘Ten blade, please.’

The general surgeon opened up the man’s midsection and got down to work. There were about 23 people in the viewing area, watching her and her team do an amazing, one of a century surgery, which she had just invented. It was just another day for Alexa Stark.

She was born in a country unknown to her father, brother and step-mother, her mother said. Her mother had told her from birth that it was best her father did not know about her- his life is not made for anyone who is not born into it, she whispered into Alexa’s ears before bed. Only that was a lie and then when she was eighteen and packing for America did her mother tell her that her father was Howard Stark. Alexa recalled his death two years ago and continued to pack. She wanted a new start and no matter what her mother said about not being able to control her powers, she would leave.

Her father had known about her. She had been an experiment. According to her mother, they had met in 1975, a year before Alexa’s birth and Howard had inserted a mysterious chemical onto her uterus, when she was sleeping. She had not known then that she was pregnant with Alexa. Not that her mother called her Alexa then. She had wanted to call her first child after her country- Hrvatska. Alexa was still thankful she decided not to.

As soon as Alexa’s mother found out, she left, with her last words to Howard being in her native language and quite rude. She travelled to London and had raised her daughter there.

For as long as Alexa could remember, she could control time. When she was young, she could slow time and use it to run out of an uncomfortable situation. She could also teleport to different places, although the further it was the more energy it would take.

When she was in med school in Seattle (they had an incredible teaching school there), Alexa had bumped into him at a coffee shop and he had immediately recognised her. Apparently, she had been in their fathers’ files and Tony had thought that she was dead because the file said unknown on her locations. In her file, Howard had put how she had been injected with some chemical left over from a magical cube in the 40s. Tony had told her their father spent most of Tony’s life searching for Captain America.

Smiling, he basically forced her to come on a ‘Brother-Sister Bonding Trip’. Alexa remembered thinking that he was crazy and craved a familial bond.  She never regretted going along with him.

Since then, they’d become incredibly close. Because she lived in Seattle, he tended to travel once every fortnight to see her and they always had Friday Face time. He had helped her find out how to better control her powers and even made her a cool suit.

‘Lil’ Grey, close up for me.’

‘Oh my God, really?’

‘Yes, now do it before I chose someone else.’

Alexa threw her bloody scrubs in the bin and left the operating room.

‘Yo, Ali, your brother is waiting for you in Hunt’s office.’ Jackson strode with her.

‘Great. Did you watch my Harper-Avery-winning, mind-blowing surgery?’ Alexa smirked, sarcasm dripping from her lips.

Jackson laughed,’I think I would know if you win any Harper Averies.’

‘Avery, come here,’ Mark Sloan ran up to Jackson and took his arm,’Hey, nice surgery, Scone Woman!’ 

‘Thanks, man-whore!’ Alexa shouted to the running men, entering the Chief of Surgery’s office.

‘Hey, sis.’
